headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Lululemon Athletica, Ralph Lauren, Under Armour and Hanesbrands
summary: LULU, RL, UAA, and HBI navigate apparel headwinds with digital growth, brand strategies, and operational overhauls in focus.

headline: 3 Reasons RL is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Ralph Lauren currently trades at $273.03 and has been a dream stock for shareholders. It’s returned 286% since June 2020, nearly tripling the S&P 500’s 97.4% gain. The company has also beaten the index over the past six months as its stock price is up 17.9% thanks to its solid quarterly results.
